review: Purchased two of these things, now I'm not the brightest bulb but I can swap a mother board and reformat a HD, so how hard can this be? Maybe I'm just getting old but in 2014 the thing should be like a refrigerator, plug it in and it works, not with these things, sorry,but if I had been able to get a human to help me with it I might be telling a different story. Anyway everyone else seems to have no trouble so what the hell do I know, maybe it's Win8,  or my HP PC, or the two year old Vizio. All I wanted to do was get Netflix to showon my TV, instead I got a 28" Hanns•G monitor and now "House of Cards" plays just great.

review: I bought this at best buy. I brought it home and hooked it up. I got to the first page and it stopped. I could not proceed after tryingfor an hour .I than called the google help line, the first thing they asked was do you have any other wi-fi item in the house or do I have a friend that could come over with theirs.I said no.they said this was a must because if you only have a desk top computer in your home and no other item that has wi fi you cannot set it up. I took it back to best buy and asked them if they knew this and they said no they did not know that and apoligized for all the trouble i went through.  Regards  Robert
